nodes.text: Jesef was a female individual who the Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi was assigned to protect while he was a Padawan. Kenobi failed in his assignment and the Shistavanen criminal T'mott Zoat killed her on the planet Helleguth around 41 BBY. After her death, the Jedi swore he would single-handedly capture Zoat and bring him to justice. Kenobi did capture Zoat, although with the aid of his friends, twenty years after Jesef's death.
Jesef was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: The Smuggler's Code, a digest sized comic book released in 2013 and written by Justin Aclin.
